plot: After a misunderstanding that just cost her her love story with Mathieu, Claire decides to break up with the Prince Charming, a man who is ideal as well as imaginary and who keeps her in an everlasting loneliness and awaiting.
title: La belle au choix navrant
plot_es: After a misunderstanding that just cost her her love story with Mathieu, Claire decides to break up with the Prince Charming, a man who is ideal as well as imaginary and who keeps her in an everlasting loneliness and awaiting.
plot_en: After a misunderstanding that just cost her her love story with Mathieu, Claire decides to break up with the Prince Charming, a man who is ideal as well as imaginary and who keeps her in an everlasting loneliness and awaiting.
